name: Stairway To Heaven
description: An alteration on doom episode 1, mission 4. Full of unpleasant surprises. Contains spider demon and cyber demon. Need to find all three keys to finish game. Brut force is not the only thing that will get you through this, you'll need your brain too. Big outside courtyard with substantial stairway. Contains tightrope walk over lava. I spent a good part of my life on this one. You'll need to know how to run to complete this. caution : do not play if you have a heart condition
